Marketing

Good Marketing makes the company look smart, while great marketing makes the customer feel smart"
Marketing is all about delivering value to the customers, while ensuring holistic benefits at large. This event requires your best self, while garnering the traits of creativity, awareness and business skills. Can you push your product to the ranks of fame? Will you survive the harsh high tides of competition?
Here’s giving you a chance to prove that you’ve got what it takes to rise against all odds.

RULES AND REGULATIONS

1) Participants must be dressed in formals.
2) Judges decision is final.
3) No vulgarity is allowed.
4) Participants should strictly adhere to time limits.
5) Misbehavior will lead to disqualification.
6) Number of participants per team- 2

Business Quiz

Did you know that Hugo Boss manufactured the uniforms for the German army during World War II? Or that the 91 in Bira91 represents India’s country code? If business trivia excites you and you can connect dots between random clues, Solaris is the place to be at. Business quiz will allow you to test your skills with the best across colleges. Let's see if you know it all.

RULES AND REGULATIONS

1) Participants must be dressed in formals.
2) It is an individual event.
3) No concessions will be entertained on technical errors.
4) Participants must have two devices in order to take part in quiz (1- Laptop, 1-phone or 2-phones).
5) The Quiz Master's decision is final.
6) Misbehavior and misconduct will lead to immediate disqualification.

Best Manager

"To be a good manager requires both Fairness and Bluntness". This is an event where the participant must represent a manager having the right leadership skills, communication skills and a sense of mind to tackle the situation. If you handle the heat and turn out to be the best then this is your event.

RULES AND REGULATIONS

1) Participants must be dressed in formals.
2) Only the shortlisted finalists will qualify for further rounds.
3) Judge's decision is final.
4) Misbehavior and misconduct will lead to disqualification.
5) Adhere to the time limit.
6) It is an individual event.

CRISIS MANAGEMENT

The identification of a threat to an organization and its stakeholders to mount an effective response to it is true crisis management. Even the best-managed businesses may be hit by a crisis caused by external or internal events.You will be shared some grilling and exciting management crisis scenarios and you have to come up with the solution of the same.

RULES AND REGULATIONS

1) Participants must be dressed in formals.
2) Misbehaviour or misconduct will lead to disqualification
3) No. of participants per team - 2
4) Plagiarism will lead to disqualification.
5) Judges decision is final decision.

Entrepreneurship Development

Good business leaders create a vision, articulate the vision, passionately own the vision, and relentlessly drive it to completion.
Entrepreneurship development is the engine fuelling innovation, employment generation and economic growth. If you have a journey of a thousand miles on your mind, this could be the first step you take towards making that journey successful. Hop in and transform yourself into a hustler.

RULES AND REGULATIONS

1) Participants must be dressed in formals.
2) No. of participants per team - 2
3)Judge's decision is final.
4)Plagiarism will lead to disqualification.
5) Participants must have laptops and phones with them.
